div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xvjo die mensis
februarij anno quo supra

The saide day Donalde baxtar was in ane Amerciament of the Court be his avne toung
graunt for the avay takin of Sex tubfull of Sande out of Sanct Ninianis
land' pertening to mastir thomas chamer et cetera tile amende as law wile and
forbeir in tyme to Cum

The said day Alexander malisone lauchfullie warnit and nocht comperit to Ansuer' to
the borghe' fundin one him be Duncan gilrutht

The said day thomas gerdane was conuict be ane Suorne assis' sere Johne ruthirfurd'
forspekar for trubulance of ser Alexander Rauff for the quhilk he was in ane Amerciament
of the Court and to amende as law wile and forbeir' in tyme to Cum ffor the quhilkis
It was ordanit and deliuerit be the saide assis' that the said' thomas sal Syt done
his kney and pray the aldirman and Counsale to make Instance to the saide ser Alexander
to forgiwe him And' to cum one Sonday that nixt Cumis in tyme of the hie mes'
with ane Candile of wax weing j li' and offir to Sanct nicholes and the haly blud'
licht one his kneys Ande gif the said' thomas falyeis in the fulfilling of
the premiss' he salbe put in the goif and stand thar at the wile of the saide ser Alexander
And' atour gif the saide thomas trubulis ony spirituale man' tyme to Cum Ande
beys conuict tharof sale pay xl s' to Sanct nicholes werk vnforgevin

The said' day Johne Colly cordonar grauntit that he hed' resauit fra Robert cordonare
xiiij hidis demi hyd' Ande Jonhne hay Cordonar grauntit he hed' resauit xij hidis
fra the said' Robert of the hidis bocht fra the Relict of vmquhile William Ranyson'

head.add: Anent canny Srathin and thomas buchane

div.p:
The said day the aldirman and ballieis chargit and ordanit Androw gordone to caus' Anny
strathachin his Spous' to bring ale chartiris and Instrumentis of Sesin quhilkis pertenis to
thomas buchane ayr to vmquhile William buchane his brothir of ale landis and annuell Rentis
pertening in heretage to the said thomas befor thame and the Counsale one friday that next cumis
that the said' thomas mycht haue the chartiris and evidencis that pertenis to him of Resone

The said' day the Aldirman and ballieis and Counsale Riplie auisit for commone gude and profit of
the burghe' Ratifeit affermit and appreuit the Statut' and Act maid' Anent the yerdis bigin
That is to say It was statut ordanit deliuerit and finaly concludit be the provest balyeis consale
and diuers' of the Comunite representand' the body of the towne that euere nychtbuir' Induellar
of this burghe sale byg and vpmak thar dykis bak dykis Syddikis and ale vthir partis of thar yerdis
quharthrowe thar nychtbouris may be skathtles tharof in tym' to cum vndir the payn' of brekin
of common ordinance Ande the partj or persone brekande this statut and commone ordinance sal
pay xl s' to Sanct nicholes werk vnforgevin thai being conuict tharof Ande mak
Satisfactioun' and recompens' to the party ande personis thar' nichtbouris of the skatht
that happinnis thame to sustene in defalt of nychtburschipe Ande Ilkane tennent
quhar' the dikis happinnis to be falty Induellar of that lande sale vpmak
the dikis of the landis quhilkis thai Inhabit' And' the expens' and Costis maid'
tharupon salbe allouit in thar maile et cetera

The saide day the bailyeis assignit friday that nixt cumis to Willieam colpe to
ansuer to the borgh fundin on him be thomas Riddale anent the frethin of
hime of xj s' x s' and xv s' of annuell Rent as law wile

The saide day the provest ande balyeis discernit the Copy of the borghe' fundin one
Androu lytstar be allane lytstar and gilbert litstar to the saide Androw that he wrang
wyslie occupeis the craft of littstary in preiudice of thame and thar craftismen' as he
that refusit' the Samyn Ande assignit monunday the secunde day of the monetht of merche
nixt to Cum to the said Androw tile ansuer' to the said borghe as law wile

The said' day the balyeis ordanit and chargit Malcum of crage to content and pay to William
futhes the thingis contenit in the act of the court producit befor tham within terme of
law or ellis to preiwe the samyn pait

Eodem die Alexander mar' fecit constituit creauit et nominauit Johannem mar' filium suum / suum virum
legitimum procuratorem Irreuocabilem et assignatam dans et concedens eisdemdem suam plenariam et omnimodam potestatem
et mandatum speciale patricium leslie premundum ad diem et locum contentum in litteram Reuersionis
ad recipiendum summam pecunie sibi debito super duo crofta sua Et eadem de manibus suis herede
aut assignato suorum redimendum Ac omniam alisa et singula faciendum et exerecendum quo ad
assignat' in consimili casu constituto de Jure aut Consuetudine pertinere in vberiore
forma assignacionis promittens de Rato et grato Cum Ceteris clausulis necessariis
et oportunis Sibi quilibet Idem Johannes mar' peciit Instrumentum Act' erant hoc in dicto pretorio
hora quam xjma presentibus gilberto menyeis preposito Jacobo Colisone Alexandro gray balliuis Dauid menyes
Alexandro Red' thoma leslie thoma Wod' Duncano Colyson' Willelmo futhes matheo branche
Dauid mar' Johanne arthour' et Richardo Waus

The said' day the court wardit for law and It was gevin for dome that Richerde
rugy hed' hyrit Johne Welane tymmirman to Cum in scotland' with him to pas' in
franche Ande humuart agane in scotland' quhilkis was Sufficientlie preuit Ande
awe to pay the said' Johne his fee Ande that was gevin for dome

The said' day thome Ridale with thomas leslie his forspekar protestit Solemptlie gif euire
he or his wyf resistis the pundis of thar' hous' quhilkis thai Inhabitis in tyme for to cum
ony annuele Rent that it suld' turne thame to nay preiudice considiring his hous' Is
annuell fre as he allegit

The said day It was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' thomas leslie forspekar
that Williame cheishame sale cum this day viij dais befor the prouest and balyeis
within the tolbutht with ane Mane in his hand' that was with him at the Rays' of
Danskin that tyme and mak fatht that he bocht demi stane prenys' of waxe and
put it in the schip to the vys' and profit of Johne Red' and gat neuire the said' wax
nor nayn profit of it And that being done thai fand' the borghe' one the said' William
be the said Johne red' for the wranguis' haldin fra him of the said demi pec' waxe
of nayne availe

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxj die februarij
anno quo supra

The said' day gilbert prestone In the nayme of tiby ruthirfurd' his wif was
in ane Amerciament of the court be his avne toung graunt for the passing one
the franchmennis schip and bying of aplis and vnyonis or the toune maid' price

Eodem die philippis Clerk per Confessionem lingue proprie fuit in amerciamento Curie pro
perturbio Alexandrum gray balliuj Cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt

The saide day Sandy thekar oblist him be his hand vphaldin to thek georg haruis'
hous' in futy Sufficientlie betuix thes ande mydlentrin

The saide day It was preuit Sufficientlie that Richerd Rugis' schipe was sufficient
quhen the salt was laid' in hir'

The saide day the Court wardit schew for law and It was gevin for dome that Richerd'
rugy skippar hede preuit lauchfullie that his schip was Sufficient quhen the Salt
was laid' in hir' in the wer' and thar' was laid' in hir' ijC and viij mettis of Salt
Ande the prouest and ballieis chargit Williame scrimgeor officiar' to pas' and charge
the merchandis' to pay thar' fraucht to the said' skippar within terme of law

Curia balliuorum burgi de Aberdene tenta in preotrio eiusdem xxiij die februarij anno
quo supra

The saide day the ballieis assignit friday that next Cumis to Jonhne Watsone to prewe
his tak of the land' that he Inhabitis Ande thareftir was preuit that he hed' nay langir
tak of the said' lande of Jonhne nay to Witsonday that next Cumis

The said' day Jonhne bisset grauntit and Jonhne Watsone happyne to flyt at the
terme of Witsonday next to Cum it was apponntit betuix thame that Suorne
personis sale Considir' the Costis and expens' maid' apon' the hous' quhilk Johne Wat
son' has biggit one Johne byssatis land' and the saide Johne bissat sale pay the price
tharof or ellis it salbe lesum to the saide Jonhne Watson' to tak avay his tymmir
of the said' hous'

The said' daay It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' patry leslie forspekar
that Richerd' rugy skippar sale pay tile Androw lousone alsmekile siluer for his
barrele of beir' as patry Red' tuk for his beir' the said' Androw and Johne Red'
making fatht Obefor how mekile was tappit and disponit of the samyn barrele
in the schipe

The said' day Dauy Kintor tuk to preiwe this day xv dais that William Watson'
wantis the cow in his defalt that he clamit him for / becaus' he wald' nocht resaue
hir Ande gif he falyeis in his preiwe to pay the price of the saide cow samekle
as the said' William preuis hir' to be availe

The said' day It was Sufficientlie preuit that Johne hay cordonare hed' pait to Robert
fraser cordonare for the xij hidis bocht fra him Obefor contenit in this buk of the hidis
bocht fra the widew of WIlliame Ranisone

Curia balliuorum burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem penultimo
die mensis februarij anno

The said' day the borghe' fundin one William cheishame be Johne red' for
the wranguis' haldin fra him of demi prenys' stane of wax was fundin
of nayn availe be ane Suorne assis' thomas leslie for the quhilkis the
said' Johne was in ane amerciament of the court and the said' William quyt of his
challance

Eodem die Andreas logy in futy conuictus fuit per assisam ex ore patricij leslie
prelocutoris eiusdem per perturbio Duncanj Souter Et Idem Duncanus conuictus fuit pro perturbio
dicti Andree et quilibet alteri emendabit ut Jura volunt
Eodem die Andreas Johnesone amerciatur in defectu presencie

The said' day comperit patry leslie and schew how that Johne of mar' assignay
tile alexander mar' his fadir' hed' warnit him to Comper certane day and place
to reaue certane money for the Redeming of tua croftis et cetera for the quhilkis the
said' patry Offerit him redy tile vndirly and abid' at the ordinance and deliuer
ance of the aldirman and balyeis Counsale anent the redeming of the said'
croftis and of ale debatis depending betuix the said' partiis tueching the
said croftis

The said day the balyeis assignit monunday the secund' day of marche nixt
to Cum tile Dauy futhes tile ansuer to the borghe' fundin one him be William
blinsele for the wranguis' haldin fra him of ix s' g' and iiijor g'

The saide day Williame Scherar litstar lauchfullie warnit callit and nocht comperit
tile ansuer to the borghe' fundin one him be William cheishame for the wrang
uis' haldin fra him of thre li' with the mair' tharfor the balyeis ordanit William
scrimgeor seriand' to pas' and tak ane stres' of the said' William scheraris and lat it to
borghe agane and it be askit and warne him to Comper this day xv dais
to ansuer' to the said' borghe' as secund' day of proces'

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem secundo die mensis marcij
anno quo supra

The saide day the prouest and balyeis dicernit the copy of the borghe' to Dauy Anthon'
fundin one him be Alexander lammyntone for the wranguis' Intrometing at his avn'
hande with half ane ox of his out of the fleshous' and aw to recompens' him for
It Ande assignit friday that next cumis to the said' Dauy to ansuer to the
said' borghe'

The said' day Allane litstar referrit to Androw litster and his seruand' to Cum this day
viij dais befor the provest and balyeis and mak fatht for this gudis clamit be the said'
Allane In the first xix punde of Spanye yrne j par of doubile cardis iij s'
vj d' j Salt cow hyde lent him to gif the franchmen'
And' iij wad' pipys lent him to mak laitht

The said day the bailyes assignit this day viij dais to William Rolland' to bring
witht him the compt and Raknyng and' Richtis quhilkis he has and' will
wis' anent the hous' setto him be Dauid colp tutor to Isabell buchan' douchtir
and' air to vmquhill Williame' buchan'
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem vjo die mensis marcij anno quo supra

Johannes Cullane Alexander Red' thomas Duncanus Colisone Willelmus portar patricius leslie
Alexander malisone Dauid Adamsone Dauid mar' patricius Andirsone Dauid Kintor gavinus
murray and thomas sousone burgenses dicti burgi Jurati dicunt quod quondam magister Andreas cra
furd' Obiit ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis Et quod thomas crafurd' est legitimis
et propinquior heres dicti quondam magistrum Andree patricij suj Et quod est legitime etatis Ceteri
puncti patent quia non fuit terre neque annuj Redditus

The said' day the court wardit schew for law and it was gevin for dome that cristy
prat hed' falyeit in his preiwe anent xl s' quhilk he tuk to preiwe pait
tile Alexander hay and to be pay the said' xl s' to the saide Alexander within xv dais

The said' day the ballieis assignit this day xv dais tile patry Red' to
ansuer to the borghe' fundin on him be Johne malisone for the wranguis'
delving and manvring of ane pece of yerd' of his

Eodem die Johannes malison' fecit constituit creauit et nominauit Jacobum Colisone et Robertum
Allardes coniunctim et diuisim suos veros et legitimos procuratores actores factores et deputatos
dans et concedens eisdem ac alteri suam potestatem et mandatum speciale plegium super
patricium porrectum pro iniusta fossione et occupacione pacie orti suj prosequendum Ac in
aliis suis eiusdem et actionibus Agendum defendendum Calumpniandum et cetera promittens de
Rato et grato Cum ceteris termis et clausulis necessariis et oportunis in vberiore
forma procuratorij

The said' day Dauy Auchone tuk to preiwe one monunday that next cumis that
the saide sex scheipe follouit be Androw lammyntone he bocht fra sere thomas
Wilyesone and has pait thame

The said' day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' thomas leslie forspekar
that Si Dauy Auchone sale pay to Sandy lammyntone fiwe schillingis within
xv dais

The said' day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' thomas leslie forspekar
that Dauy Anthone is aving tile Alecander prat ane franche crovne of gold' and
atour the said' Dauy grantit him aving to the saide Alexander fiwe s' and viij d'
quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to pay within terme of law
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xj die marcij anno quo supra

The said' day the prouest and ballieis assignit friday that next cumis to William
futhes and Duncan Colisone to Ansuer to mathou stanlie Curatour' to Robert
chepman and to the said' Robert Anent the gudis and malys with the quhilkis
thai haue Intromettit pertening to the saide Robert Ande Inlik thai ordanit
the saide Robert tile ansuer to the saidez Williame and Duncan in the
thingis thai haue to say to him
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xiij die marcij anno quo supra

The said' day It was fullely apponitit and accordit betuix honorabil' personis mathowe
stanly Curatour to Robert chepman Sone and ayr to vmquhile thomas chepman burges
of Abirdene one that ane part Ande Williame futhes and Duncan Colisone one that vthir part In manere
and forme eftir follouing that is to say gilbert menyeis prouest Alexander Rede Androw Cullan
and Alexander gray was chosin with consent and assent of batht the said' partiis to se considir
and vnderstand' be thar conscience and lavte ale the Costis and expens' maid' and exponit
be the said' Williame and Duncan in the matiris erandis and doingis concerning the said'
Robert in ale placis and one him Self Ande to divis' the Caucioun ande
Sikirnes to be fundin be the said' Robert and mathou his Curatour' quharthrow
thai salbe skathtles and quyt of of the said' Robert mastir thomas chamer
Androw mortymer and ale vthiris in tyme to Cum Anent ale Interes'and clamys that thai
may be clamyt of concerning the said' Robert And' the said partiis was oblist
be the fathtis of thar bodiis to stand' at the ordinance and deliuerance of the said'
personis In the premiss' and that being done the said' William sale deliuer the
gudis pertening to the said' Robert and his Curatour to thame with the quhilkis he
Intromettit with the Expens' maid' be the said' William and Duncan being
refundit to thame

The said' day the balyeis continevit the borghe' fundin one Williame scherar litstar be William
cheishame Anent the clame of thre li' with the mair' to this day xv dais for Wak
nes of the Court bot preiudice of ony partj

The said' day It was appontit and finalie concordit betuix Androw fyf one that ane part Ande Duncan
fyf one that vthir part In manere and forme eftir follouing That is to say the said' Duncan suld'
fische and Intermet with the half nethis fischingis of the Raik pertening to thar fadir for this Instant
yer' Ande ale fische that happinis to be gottin tharof salbe equalie pertit and diuidit betuix tham
tua and thai sale pay the maile tharof equalie ymang thame to the kepin and fulfilling tharof
Ilkane of thame was oblist tile vthir be the fathtis of thar bodiis
